body:
Comment 1 by **robert.griesemer**: 
Complex numbers can be implemented using rectangular (re, im) or polar (r, theta)
coordinates, and which one is 
better depends on which operations are prevalent. A implementation of complex numbers
might even alternate 
between the two representations. Furthermore, for it to be useful various conversions
need to be supported.

This should be implemented via a library rather than provided directly by the language.
